subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Redskins’ lopsided loss to the Packers capped a winless weekend for the four home teams — something that had never happened in the wild-card round under a system that began in the 1990 season.
snippet: The Redskins’ lopsided loss to the Packers capped a winless weekend for the four home teams — something that had never happened in the wild-card round under a system that began in the 1990 season.
